fb.rt.math.matrix
Class M_ADD

                          fb.rt.math.FBFunctionQS2
                              fb.rt.math.matrix.M_ADD
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventServer
Direct Known Subclasses:
M_INV, M_MUL, M_SUB
public class M_ADD
extends FBFunctionQS2

Performs MATRIX addition. Upon the occurrence of an event at the REQ input, the sum of the IN1 and IN2 inputs is placed in the OUT output, and the size of the output matrix is automatically adjusted to hold the result.

  • Exceptions are documented in the figure below and in the req() method.
  • Operational sequences are documented in the figure below.

See the TEST_MATRIX system configuration for an example of the use of an instance of this class.

Constructor Detail

M_ADD

public M_ADD()
The single constructor for this FB type. Sets IN1, IN2, OUT to be of type MATRIX.

req

public void req()
Performs the requested operation. If the sizes of IN1 and IN2 are inconsistent, sets STATUS to ARRAY_SIZE_ERROR and QO to FALSE.

Specified by:
req in class FBFunction
See Also:
